name: Block 618
description:
Humankind has got stuck in their ways again.

The ever growing digitalisation, man’s eagerness to not do any real labor, and that the ones that do work, retire in their early 30s... has resulted in a non-worker to worker ratio of about 5890:1

Being the last one working in the deteriorating Block 618, you really have to make sure the knowledge of the past doesn’t get lost. Your inhabitants need food and water.

The fact that the mainframe is breaking down/losing its mind in your little corner of the world doesn’t help either...

  • WASD or arrows to move.
  • Cook food by entering kitchen.
  • Flush waste by entering waste area.
  • Fix the broken mainframe by collecting the lost CPU cores.

All assets except font where made for the jam (Share Tech Mono)

Software used:

  • Godot Engine
  • Blender
  • SideFX Houdini
  • 3D Coat
  • Affinity Photo
